thread.title: As Shahid Afridi announces retirement, Twitter goes berserk
thread.title_full: As Shahid Afridi announces retirement, Twitter goes berserk

title: As Shahid Afridi announces retirement, Twitter goes berserk
text:
As Shahid Afridi announces retirement, Twitter goes berserk Web Team /Dubai   Share 
(Reuters) The 36-year-old cricketer has already quit Test and ODI cricket As Pakistani cricketer Shahid Afridi announces his retirement from the international cricket , it invited mixed reactions from netizensaround the world. While some still don't seem to believe his plan, many have expressed shock over his decision. However, there are some who have taken the news with ting of humour. The retirement ends his 21-year-old career as one of the leading batsman in Pakistan cricket team. The 36-year-old cricketer has already quit Test and ODI cricket. Take a look at some Twitter reactions: - Pawan SinghA (@urbanpendu00) February 20, 2017 Shahid Afridi Timeline
